content: 5 12 14 cm from cast on edge or about 1 ¼ - 1 ½ /3 - 4 cm less than desired length heel -begin working back and forth in short row work on first 16 18 20 stitches of the row the remaining stitches will be on hold for the leg - knit 15 17 19 stitches wrap the following stitch and turn -purl 14 16 18 stitches wrap the following stitch and turn -knit until 1 stitch before the next wrapped stitch wrap the following stitch and turn 2 -purl until 1 stitch before the next wrapped stitch wrap the following stitch and turn -continue to wrap and turn until there are 6 8 8 stitches not wrapped in the middle of the heel ending after a purl row -begin unwrapping stitches knit to the first wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and knit it together with the wrapped stitch turn -slip 1 stitch purl to the first wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and purl it together with the wrapped stitch turn -slip 1 stitch knit to the first wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and purl it together with the wrapped stitch turn -continue unwrapping each stitch in this manner one at a time until all stitches have been worked stitch count will be restored to 32 36 40 stitches leg -resume working in the round knit to 1 stitch before the held leg stitches pick up a stitch in the space between the heel and the leg and knit it together with the last stitch of the heel this will close the gap between heel and leg knit to 1 stitch before the end of the row pick up a stitch in the space between the leg and the heel and knit it together with the last stitch of the leg 32 36 40 stitches -work 10 row in stockinette stitch knit every round or desired leg length cuff -work 5 row in knit 1 purl 1 ribbing -bind off in jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off or preferred stretchy bind off finishing and terms of use
